name: github-audio-feed
description: sound localized github commits for the 2016 Fall HackED

scripts.start: node_modules/watchify/bin/cmd.js main.js -o bundle.js & node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass style.scss -wo . --source-map . & node_modules/live-server/live-server.js . --ignore="style.scss,style.css.map"

author: Denis Lachance
